verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> came אַֽחֲרֵיכֵ֡ן <WH310> It came to pass after this בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> came בְנֵי־ <WH1121> also [that] the children מוֹאָב֩ <WH4124> of Moab וּבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> and the children עַמּ֜וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וְעִמָּהֶ֧ם ׀ <WH5973> together מֵֽהָעַמּוֹנִ֛ים <WH5984> and with them [other] beside the Ammonites עַל־ <WH5921> against יְהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <WH3092> against Jehoshaphat לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> to battle

וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <WH935> Then there came וַיַּגִּ֤ידוּ <WH5046> some that told לִֽיהוֹשָׁפָט֙ <WH3092> Jehoshaphat לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying בָּ֣א <WH935> There cometh עָלֶ֜יךָ <WH5921> against הָמ֥וֹן <WH1995> multitude רָ֛ב <WH7227> a great מֵעֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> against thee from beyond לַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> the sea מֵאֲרָ֑ם <WH758> on this side Syria וְהִנָּם֙ <WH2009> and behold בְּחַֽצְצ֣וֹן תָּמָ֔ר <WH2688> and behold they [be] in Hazazontamar הִ֖יא <WH1931> he עֵ֥ין גֶּֽדִי׃ <WH5872> which [is] Engedi

וַיִּרָ֕א <WH3372> feared וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> and set יְהוֹשָׁפָ֛ט <WH3092> And Jehoshaphat אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> himself לִדְר֣וֹשׁ <WH1875> to seek לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיִּקְרָא־ <WH7121> and proclaimed צ֖וֹם <WH6685> a fast עַל־ <WH5921> throughout כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> all Judah

וַיִּקָּבְצ֣וּ <WH6908> gathered themselves together יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> And Judah לְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> to ask מֵֽיְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> [help] of the LORD גַּ֚ם <WH1571> even מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> even out of all the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah בָּ֖אוּ <WH935> they came לְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <WH1245> to seek אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> stood יְהוֹשָׁפָ֗ט <WH3092> And Jehoshaphat בִּקְהַ֧ל <WH6951> in the congregation יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> of Judah וִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> and Jerusalem בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before הֶחָצֵ֥ר <WH2691> court הַחֲדָשָֽׁה׃ <WH2319> the new

וַיֹּאמַ֗ר <WH559> And said יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> God אֲבֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH1> of our fathers הֲלֹ֨א <WH3808> not אַתָּֽה־ <WH859> you ה֤וּא <WH1931> he אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> [art] not thou God בַּשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> air וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you מוֹשֵׁ֔ל <WH4910> reign בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <WH4467> [not] thou over all the kingdoms הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> Gentile וּבְיָדְךָ֙ <WH3027> your hand כֹּ֣חַ <WH3581> [is there not] power וּגְבוּרָ֔ה <WH1369> and might וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> no עִמְּךָ֖ <WH5973> against לְהִתְיַצֵּֽב׃ <WH3320> so that none is able to withstand

הֲלֹ֣א ׀ <WH3808> not אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> O אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> [Art] not thou our God הוֹרַ֙שְׁתָּ֙ <WH3423> [who] didst drive out אֶת־ <WH853> יֹשְׁבֵי֙ <WH3427> the inhabitants הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> of this land הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise מִלִּפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before עַמְּךָ֣ <WH5971> thy people יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel וַֽתִּתְּנָ֗הּ <WH5414> and gavest לְזֶ֛רַע <WH2233> it to the seed אַבְרָהָ֥ם <WH85> of Abraham אֹֽהַבְךָ֖ <WH157> thy friend לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> alway

וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ־ <WH3427> And they dwelt בָ֑הּ וַיִּבְנ֨וּ <WH1129> therein and have built לְךָ֧ ׀ בָּ֛הּ מִקְדָּ֖שׁ <WH4720> thee a sanctuary לְשִׁמְךָ֥ <WH8034> therein for thy name לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אִם־ <WH518> Should תָּב֨וֹא <WH935> cometh עָלֵ֜ינוּ <WH5921> and רָעָ֗ה <WH7451> If [when] evil חֶרֶב֮ <WH2719> upon us [as] the sword שְׁפוֹט֮ <WH8196> judgment וְדֶ֣בֶר <WH1698> or pestilence וְרָעָב֒ <WH7458> or famine נַֽעַמְדָ֞ה <WH5975> we stand לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> before הַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> this house הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this וּלְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> and in thy presence כִּ֥י <WH3588> שִׁמְךָ֖ <WH8034> (for thy name בַּבַּ֣יִת <WH1004> house הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וְנִזְעַ֥ק <WH2199> assemble אֵלֶ֛יךָ <WH413> to you מִצָּרָתֵ֖נוּ <WH6869> unto thee in our affliction וְתִשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> then thou wilt hear וְתוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH3467> and help

וְעַתָּ֡ה <WH6258> Now הִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> behold בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And now behold the children עַמּ֨וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וּמוֹאָ֜ב <WH4124> and Moab וְהַר־ <WH2022> and mount שֵׂעִ֗יר <WH8165> Seir אֲ֠שֶׁר <WH834> whom לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not נָתַ֤תָּה <WH5414> whom thou wouldest not let לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Israel לָב֣וֹא <WH935> invade בָהֶ֔ם בְּבֹאָ֖ם <WH935> when they came out מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt כִּ֛י <WH3588> סָ֥רוּ <WH5493> but they turned מֵעֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and did not הִשְׁמִידֽוּם׃ <WH8045> from them and destroyed

וְהִ֨נֵּה־ <WH2009> see הֵ֔ם <WH1992> like גֹּמְלִ֖ים <WH1580> Behold [I say how] they reward עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> by לָבוֹא֙ <WH935> us to come לְגָ֣רְשֵׁ֔נוּ <WH1644> to cast us out מִיְּרֻשָּׁתְךָ֖ <WH3425> of thy possession אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הֽוֹרַשְׁתָּֽנוּ׃ <WH3423> which thou hast given us to inherit

אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH430> O our God הֲלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תִשְׁפָּט־ <WH8199> wilt thou not judge בָּ֔ם כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֵ֥ין <WH369> else בָּ֙נוּ֙ כֹּ֔חַ <WH3581> them? for we have no might לִ֠פְנֵי <WH6440> against הֶהָמ֥וֹן <WH1995> company הָרָ֛ב <WH7227> this great הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this הַבָּ֣א <WH935> that cometh עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> against וַאֲנַ֗חְנוּ <WH587> we לֹ֤א <WH3808> nor נֵדַע֙ <WH3045> against us neither know מַֽה־ <WH4100> what נַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> what to do כִּ֥י <WH3588> for עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> against עֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5869> but our eyes

וְכָ֨ל־ <WH3605> All יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> And all Judah עֹמְדִ֖ים <WH5975> stood לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD גַּם־ <WH1571> with טַפָּ֖ם <WH2945> their little ones נְשֵׁיהֶ֥ם <WH802> their wives וּבְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1121> and their children פ

וְיַחֲזִיאֵ֡ל <WH3166> Then upon Jahaziel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son זְכַרְיָ֡הוּ <WH2148> of Zechariah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בְּ֠נָיָה <WH1141> of Benaiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְעִיאֵ֧ל <WH3273> of Jeiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מַתַּנְיָ֛ה <WH4983> of Mattaniah הַלֵּוִ֖י <WH3881> a Levite מִן־ <WH4480> at בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons אָסָ֑ף <WH623> of Asaph הָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> came עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> came the Spirit יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst הַקָּהָֽל׃ <WH6951> of the congregation

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said הַקְשִׁ֤יבוּ <WH7181> Hearken כָל־ <WH3605> all יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> ye all Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and ye inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וְהַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> and thou king יְהוֹשָׁפָ֑ט <WH3092> Jehoshaphat כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> the LORD לָכֶ֗ם אַ֠תֶּם <WH859> you אַל־ <WH408> not תִּֽירְא֤וּ <WH3372> unto you Be not afraid וְאַל־ <WH408> not תֵּחַ֙תּוּ֙ <WH2865> nor dismayed מִפְּנֵ֨י <WH6440> by reason הֶהָמ֤וֹן <WH1995> multitude הָרָב֙ <WH7227> of this great הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> of this כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> not לָכֶ֛ם הַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> for the battle כִּ֥י <WH3588> but לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> [is] not yours but God's

מָחָר֙ <WH4279> To morrow רְד֣וּ <WH3381> go ye down עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> against הִנָּ֥ם <WH2005> behold עֹלִ֖ים <WH5927> against them behold they come up בְּמַעֲלֵ֣ה <WH4608> by the cliff הַצִּ֑יץ <WH6732> of Ziz וּמְצָאתֶ֤ם <WH4672> and ye shall find אֹתָם֙ <WH853> בְּס֣וֹף <WH5490> them at the end הַנַּ֔חַל <WH5158> of the brook פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> before מִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> the wilderness יְרוּאֵֽל׃ <WH3385> of Jeruel

לֹ֥א <WH3808> not לָכֶ֖ם לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <WH3898> Ye shall not [need] to fight בָּזֹ֑את <WH2063> in this הִתְיַצְּב֣וּ <WH3320> [battle] set עִמְד֡וּ <WH5975> yourselves stand וּרְא֣וּ <WH7200> ye [still] and see אֶת־ <WH853> יְשׁוּעַת֩ <WH3444> the salvation יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> of the LORD עִמָּכֶ֜ם <WH5973> your behalf יְהוּדָ֣ה <WH3063> with you O Judah וִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> and Jerusalem אַל־ <WH408> nay תִּֽירְאוּ֙ <WH3372> fear וְאַל־ <WH408> not תֵּחַ֔תּוּ <WH2865> not nor be dismayed מָחָר֙ <WH4279> to morrow צְא֣וּ <WH3318> go out לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> against וַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> them for the LORD עִמָּכֶֽם׃ <WH5973> your behalf

וַיִּקֹּ֧ד <WH6915> bowed יְהוֹשָׁפָ֛ט <WH3092> And Jehoshaphat אַפַּ֖יִם <WH639> his head with [his] face אָ֑רְצָה <WH776> to the ground וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יְהוּדָ֞ה <WH3063> and all Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem נָֽפְלוּ֙ <WH5307> fell לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD לְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֖ת <WH7812> worshipping לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַיָּקֻ֧מוּ <WH6965> stood up הַלְוִיִּ֛ם <WH3881> And the Levites מִן־ <WH4480> from בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children הַקְּהָתִ֖ים <WH6956> of the Kohathites וּמִן־ <WH4480> and of בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> and of the children הַקָּרְחִ֑ים <WH7145> of the Korhites לְהַלֵּ֗ל <WH1984> to praise לַיהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּק֥וֹל <WH6963> voice גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> with a loud לְמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> on high

וַיַּשְׁכִּ֣ימוּ <WH7925> And they rose early בַבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַיֵּצְא֖וּ <WH3318> and went forth לְמִדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> into the wilderness תְּק֑וֹעַ <WH8620> of Tekoa וּבְצֵאתָ֞ם <WH3318> and as they went forth עָמַ֣ד <WH5975> stood יְהוֹשָׁפָ֗ט <WH3092> Jehoshaphat וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said שְׁמָע֗וּנִי <WH8085> Hear יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> me O Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and ye inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem הַאֲמִ֜ינוּ <WH539> Believe בַּיהוָ֤ה <WH3068> in the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶם֙ <WH430> your God וְתֵ֣אָמֵ֔נוּ <WH539> so shall ye be established הַאֲמִ֥ינוּ <WH539> believe בִנְבִיאָ֖יו <WH5030> his prophets וְהַצְלִֽיחוּ׃ <WH6743> so shall ye prosper

וַיִּוָּעַץ֙ <WH3289> And when he had consulted אֶל־ <WH413> with הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> with the people וַיַּעֲמֵ֤ד <WH5975> he appointed מְשֹֽׁרֲרִים֙ <WH7891> singers לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וּֽמְהַֽלְלִ֖ים <WH1984> and that should praise לְהַדְרַת־ <WH1927> the beauty קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of holiness בְּצֵאת֙ <WH3318> as they went out לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הֶֽחָל֔וּץ <WH2502> the army וְאֹֽמְרִים֙ <WH559> and to say הוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> Praise לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy

וּבְעֵת֩ <WH6256> And when הֵחֵ֨לּוּ <WH2490> they began בְרִנָּ֜ה <WH7440> to sing וּתְהִלָּ֗ה <WH8416> and to praise נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> set יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> the LORD מְ֠אָֽרְבִים <WH693> ambushments עַל־ <WH5921> against בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> against the children עַמּ֜וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon מוֹאָ֧ב <WH4124> Moab וְהַר־ <WH2022> and mount שֵׂעִ֛יר <WH8165> Seir הַבָּאִ֥ים <WH935> which were come לִֽיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> against Judah וַיִּנָּגֵֽפוּ׃ <WH5062> and they were smitten

וַ֠יַּֽעַמְדוּ <WH5975> stood up בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> For the children עַמּ֧וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וּמוֹאָ֛ב <WH4124> and Moab עַל־ <WH5921> against יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> against the inhabitants הַר־ <WH2022> of mount שֵׂעִ֖יר <WH8165> Seir לְהַחֲרִ֣ים <WH2763> utterly to slay וּלְהַשְׁמִ֑יד <WH8045> and destroy וּכְכַלּוֹתָם֙ <WH3615> [them] and when they had made an end בְּיוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> of the inhabitants שֵׂעִ֔יר <WH8165> of Seir עָזְר֥וּ <WH5826> helped אִישׁ־ <WH376> every one בְּרֵעֵ֖הוּ <WH7453> another לְמַשְׁחִֽית׃ <WH4889> to destroy

וִֽיהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> And when Judah בָּ֥א <WH935> came עַל־ <WH5921> unto הַמִּצְפֶּ֖ה <WH4707> the lookout לַמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> in the wilderness וַיִּפְנוּ֙ <WH6437> they looked אֶל־ <WH413> toward הֶ֣הָמ֔וֹן <WH1995> unto the multitude וְהִנָּ֧ם <WH2005> behold פְּגָרִ֛ים <WH6297> and behold they [were] dead bodies נֹפְלִ֥ים <WH5307> fallen אַ֖רְצָה <WH776> to the earth וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and no פְּלֵיטָֽה׃ <WH6413> and none escaped

וַיִּתְנַבֵּ֞א <WH5012> prophesied אֱלִיעֶ֤זֶר <WH461> Then Eliezer בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son דֹּדָוָ֙הוּ֙ <WH1735> of Dodavah מִמָּ֣רֵשָׁ֔ה <WH4762> of Mareshah עַל־ <WH5921> against יְהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <WH3092> against Jehoshaphat לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כְּהִֽתְחַבֶּרְךָ֣ <WH2266> Because thou hast joined עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲחַזְיָ֗הוּ <WH274> thyself with Ahaziah פָּרַ֤ץ <WH6555> hath broken יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֶֽת־ <WH853> מַעֲשֶׂ֔יךָ <WH4639> thy works וַיִּשָּׁבְר֣וּ <WH7665> were broken אֳנִיּ֔וֹת <WH591> And the ships וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not עָצְר֖וּ <WH6113> that they were not able לָלֶ֥כֶת <WH1980> go אֶל־ <WH413> to תַּרְשִֽׁישׁ׃ <WH8659> to Tarshish
